Contributor: Forestier, A., artist.; W.H. Smith & Son, publisher.; Arden Press, publisher.;
Note: Signed "A. Forestier." Date based on dates of 1st World War. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that July 14th is France's Day in aid of the French Red Cross. Please help. Illustration shows a Red Cross nurse standing below flags of the Red Cross and Britain. Other nurses are helping the wounded.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: London : W.H. Smith & Son, The Arden Press,

Title: For the French Red Cross
